rows.label: Services Revenue
rows.details: The income a company receives for performing a service

rows.label: Products Revenue
rows.details: Total amount of income an individual product generates

rows.label: Cost of Services (exclusive of depreciation and ammortization)
Cost of Products (exclusive of depreciation and ammortization)
Depreciation and Amortization
rows.details: Depreciation is the amount of asset value lost over time. Amortization is a method for decreasing an asset cost over a period of time.

rows.label: Net Income
rows.details: Net income is what a business or individual makes after taxes, deductions, and other expenses are taken out
